1370: Lielde was born in Marcktgang in 1370.
Got married to Mourin at age 14 in 1370.
Gave birth to Marcibilia in 1370 at age 14.
1384: Died while giving birth to Euffemia in 1384 at age 28.
1371: Gave birth to Kerolus in 1371 at age 15.
1372: Gave birth to Hardenbernus in 1372 at age 16.
Lost son Kerolus when Kerolus was 2 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Berta in 1375 at age 19.
1379: Gave birth to Hille in 1379 at age 23.
Lost daughter Hille when Hille was 1 years old.
